attributes.action: Should the government be on the minimum wage like the rest of us.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Should the government be on the minimum wage like the rest of us.

The PM and MP set the minimum wage of £5.85 per hour,  so why don’t  they work on the minimum wage like us.

To help the credit problem they should take a pay cut.
